hero.title: Ori-OS security
hero.subtitle: How we keep your data safe, maintain uptime, and earn your trust.

intro.title: Security-first by design
paragraphs: Ori-OS is built for B2B agencies, consultancies, and tech SMEs that handle sensitive contact and pipeline data. Security is not an afterthought; it's embedded in how we design, build, and operate the platform.
This page outlines our approach to infrastructure security, application security, data protection, and compliance. If you have questions not covered here, reach out to security@ori-craftlabs.com.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure security
points: Hosted on major cloud providers with ISO 27001 and SOC 2 Type II certifications.
Data encrypted at rest (AES-256) and in transit (TLS 1.2+).
Regularly patched and updated infrastructure with automated vulnerability scanning.
Network segmentation and firewall rules to isolate workloads.

application.title: Application security
points: Role-based access control (RBAC) for organizations, workspaces, and individual records.
Secure authentication with support for two-factor authentication (2FA).
Session timeouts and automatic logouts for inactive sessions.
Input validation and output encoding to prevent injection attacks.

dataProtection.title: Data protection
points: Logical separation of customer data at the workspace level.
Regular backups with tested restore procedures.
Data retention controls configurable per workspace.
GDPR-aligned data export and deletion workflows.

accessControl.title: Access control
points: Principle of least privilege for internal access to customer data.
Audit logs for sensitive actions within the application.
Secure invite and onboarding flows for new team members.
Optional IP allowlisting for enterprise customers.

monitoringIncidents.title: Monitoring and incidents
points: 24/7 monitoring of application health and availability.
Automated alerting for anomalies and potential security events.
Defined incident response process with escalation paths.
Post-incident reviews and improvements published when appropriate.

developmentPractices.title: Development practices
points: Secure development lifecycle with code reviews and automated testing.
Regular security training for engineering team members.
Third-party penetration tests conducted periodically.
Dependency scanning and timely patching of known vulnerabilities.

compliance.title: Compliance
paragraphs: Ori-OS is designed to support GDPR compliance for our customers. We provide lawful-basis field support, data subject request workflows, and audit logs to help you meet your obligations.
points: Data Processing Agreement (DPA) available for all customers.
Clear sub-processor list maintained and updated.
Support for data portability and erasure requests.
Transparent documentation of data handling practices.

responsibleDisclosure.title: Responsible disclosure
paragraphs: If you discover a security vulnerability in Ori-OS, we appreciate your help in disclosing it to us in a responsible manner. Please email security@ori-craftlabs.com with details, and we will investigate promptly.
points: We aim to respond to security reports within 48 hours.
We will keep you informed of our progress toward a fix.
We welcome feedback from security researchers and customers alike.

contact.title: Questions?
contact.paragraph: For security-related inquiries, reach out to our security team.
